name: Robot Reaper (Deaglan)
description:
Grapple, jump and launch yourself through a massive gauntlet of enemies.

Wielding a scythe, grapple hook and gun x 2, you have lots of movement options and ways of fighting your enemies.

Controls, movement left stick to move right stick to aim or WASD and mouse.

Right trigger to and left trigger to shoot with your right and left respectively, use the arrow keys, or the d-pad to change between weapon modes.

Space or the bottom face button to jump and shift or press the left stick to sprint, or when grappling to reel yourself in.

Hope you enjoy!

Done for the second Narrative game jam.
